title: Vegan Butternut Squash Soup with Ginger, Apple, and Coconut Milk

Ingredients.3: 1 (1 1/2 inch) piece fresh ginger root, minced

Ingredients.4: 1  butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

Ingredients.9: 1 salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

Ingredients.11: 1 teaspoon maple syrup, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat oil in a large pot over low heat and cook onion and ginger until soft and translucent without browning onion, about 10 minutes. Add butternut squash and carrot; cook and stir, about 3 minutes. Add apple and cook for 2 minutes. Pour in broth, increase heat to medium, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until vegetables are soft, about 20 minutes. Puree soup with an immersion blender until smooth.

Directions.2: Pour coconut milk into the soup and season with salt and pepper. Add lemon juice and maple syrup; stir until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes.
